tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE field (field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 field_name VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 soil_moisture_level DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE crop (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 crop_name VARCHAR(255),
 plant_date DATE,
 field_id INT REFERENCES field(field_id));

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 field_id INT REFERENCES field(field_id),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 amount_of_water DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 field_id INT REFERENCES field(field_id),
 reading_date TIMESTAMP,
 moisture_reading DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE soil_moisture(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  moisture_level DECIMAL(5,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field(id)
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  duration INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field(id)
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_log(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field(id)
);

CREATE TABLE moisture_threshold(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  threshold DECIMAL(5,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field(id)
);
